column1:
Overall Positive Sentiment Percentages:

Cleaniness: 0.0% 
Amenities: 57.25% 
Location: 47.99% 
Services: 50.52% 
General: 53.87% 
Value: 33.10% 

Suggestions for Improvement: 
1. For Cleanliness: Emphasize the importance of regular cleaning of the property. Increase efforts to ensure all sections and rooms of the property are kept clean.
2. For Amenities: Add more amenities that guests can enjoy at the property such as exclusive recreational activities or upgraded lounge areas.
3. For Location: Make sure the property is within easy access from local transport hubs such as airports or train stations.
4. For Services: Train staff to better meet customer needs and provide a higher level of service. Increase communication with guests to ensure satisfaction.
5. For General: Make sure all areas of the property are safe and well-maintained. Increase focus on providing better quality food and beverages.
6. For Value: Offer more special discounted packages or upgrades that guests would find attractive. Increase efforts to ensure customer satisfaction and value.
